title: Lab Sustainability Programs LEAF and My Green Lab: impact, user experience & suitability

Facing the climate crisis and planetary boundaries, research institutions must address the challenge of becoming climate-neutral and using resources more sustainably. Natural science laboratories are the most resource-intensive and CO2-emitting...
